transcript_details:
Agent: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Customer: Hi, I'm having trouble with my recent order. It hasn't arrived yet.
Agent: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me look into that for you right away.
Customer: Thank you, I really appreciate your help.
Agent: I've checked your order status. It appears there was a delay at the shipping facility.
Customer: Oh, I see. When can I expect it?
Agent: It should arrive within the next 2 business days. I've also applied a discount to your next purchase as an apology.
Customer: That's great! Thank you so much for resolving this quickly.

Agent: Good morning! What can I do for you today?
Customer: I need to return an item I purchased last week.
Agent: Certainly! I can help you process that return. May I know the reason?
Customer: It doesn't fit properly.
Agent: I understand. I'll send you a prepaid return label via email.
Customer: Perfect, thanks!
Agent: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?
Customer: No, that's all. Great service!

Agent: Hi there! How may I help you?
Customer: I'm really frustrated. I've been trying to use this coupon code but it's not working.
Agent: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me check the code for you.
Customer: It's been 10 minutes already!
Agent: I apologize for the wait. The code appears to have expired yesterday.
Customer: This is terrible service. You should have notified me!
Agent: You're absolutely right. I'll create a new code for you with an extended validity period.
Customer: Fine. I hope this works.
Agent: I've sent the new code to your email. It's valid for 30 days.
Customer: Okay, thank you.

Agent: Welcome! How can I assist you today?
Customer: I have a question about your warranty policy.
Agent: I'd be happy to explain our warranty policy. What would you like to know?
Customer: How long is the warranty period for electronics?
Agent: Our electronics come with a standard 2-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.
Customer: That's excellent! What about accidental damage?
Agent: Accidental damage can be covered with our extended protection plan.
Customer: Sounds good. How much does that cost?
Agent: It varies by product, but typically ranges from $20-$50.
Customer: Perfect! I'll consider that. Thanks for the information.

Agent: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. How may I help?
Customer: Hi, I want to change my shipping address for an order.
Agent: I can definitely help with that. Do you have your order number?
Customer: Yes, it's ORD-12345.
Agent: Thank you. What's the new shipping address?
Customer: 123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001.
Agent: I've updated your shipping address. The order will be delivered to the new address.
Customer: Wonderful! When will it arrive?
Agent: Based on the updated address, delivery is estimated for November 28th.
Customer: Perfect timing! Thank you so much for your help.
